content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once you know who’s the Customer, it’s time to learn the EPAM and KDP’s story. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Keurig decided to implement the first POC to connect a brewer in 2014. After POC was successfully completed, Keurig moved toward creating a fully functional connected brewer, backend and a mobile app and invited EPAM to join their effort. EPAM was responsible for UX and UI design of the mobile app as well as its implementation. The team was rather small and included a few mobile developers, QA, creative designers and a mobile architect. At the beginning, the mobile team relied on dev kits and connectivity boards to implement and test the application. The first EPAM deliverables included a mobile app that could control an LED on a dev kit board via wifi and IoT cloud. It took a about year to create the final version of dev brewer and deliver it to Minsk.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":131651,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/71b21b7f-4483-4dfd-95e2-ad3eddcf9389/Capture.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/71b21b7f-4483-4dfd-95e2-ad3eddcf9389/Capture.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.JPG\",\"name\":\"Capture.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"71b21b7f-4483-4dfd-95e2-ad3eddcf9389\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":549.3618763961281},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our relationship with Keurig evolved over the subsequent years, bringing us new workstreams and extending the team. Along with mobile application development, we started working on the IOT Cloud platform and Voice Control applications. We launched Support and DevOps teams, along with several other squads. More details about the story and headcount you may find below.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":89024,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/37bf7e28-b287-44cc-9b86-6111e4018d74/EPAM & KPD.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/37bf7e28-b287-44cc-9b86-6111e4018d74/EPAM & KPD.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"EPAM & KPD.PNG\",\"name\":\"EPAM & KPD.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"37bf7e28-b287-44cc-9b86-6111e4018d74\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":536.4742268041238},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Below, you will see some project statistics at a glance. We have 45+ ppl working from Belarus, Ukraine, Russia, and the US. We have 4 teams working on 8 distinct workstreams. We use quite a variety of technologies in our project ecosystem.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":123897,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e99b1eb9-3754-4111-89e4-7ef36a5ee321/Keurig2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e99b1eb9-3754-4111-89e4-7ef36a5ee321/Keurig2.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Keurig2.PNG\",\"name\":\"Keurig2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e99b1eb9-3754-4111-89e4-7ef36a5ee321\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":530.3191800878477},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Now, since you’ve become a part of our amazing team, it’s about time to get familiar with KPD Values and Goals. And to do that, please, review the slides below.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"size\":125985,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b5975320-b979-436d-8a3d-24739ec10299/slides.pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b5975320-b979-436d-8a3d-24739ec10299/slides.pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"slides.pdf\",\"name\":\"slides.pdf\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"pdf\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"iframe\",\"id\":\"b5975320-b979-436d-8a3d-24739ec10299\",\"extension\":\"pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Useful links:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/GMCRCOMM/About+US?preview=/713365397/724863518/EPAM%20CEO%20Showcase.pptx%20%E2%80%8B\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Find out our CEO Showcase Award Story \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
